title: New Skin Idea
body:
Hey Guys Big Blue Troll here
I have an Idea about a skin that would actually be edible. Its a Skin that looks like a Scary Clown Skin and all of them are like wearing leather coat covering all their skins and stuff. Other's wear a bulletproof vest. Like an actual heist stealing money from the bank and stuff. These are the candidates;

**Graves**: I mean why not right? He will look sick with clown face on. and at least just a Brown Leather Jacket with a Scary Clown Face. 

**Mundo**: Why the hell not? I mean a guy who's throwing  knife. Mass murderer on the move.

**Singed**: Singed is a good one. Releasing smoke gas while his team is escaping? Heist? Yea I believe a smoke are the best to escape.

**Jinx**: I mean a psychotic girl carrying a machine gun and a bazooka? Nothing could go wrong with that.

**Shaco**: I mean why not? He's the real clown from the start after all.

and the last one is....

**Ziggz**: A bomb planting machine. Everyone needs that!!.. I mean why not?? Imagine Ziggz wearing a white Mask with a scary face on it throwing bombs. But I'll be best if the bomb animation is an actual grenade bomb.

Please consider my request RIOT. :) Thanks!! Its a good idea though.. why not right?? I'm pretty sure you guys will find a way to get this done.

replies.body: I'd like an edible skin please. That's with Large fries as well.
Hmm .. kinda.. but suit and tie is not really my style. So no suit and tie just a typical Brown/Black leather coat gloves. Vest inside. Why not?
